channel.title: CVE Feed for Acoustic Technology, Inc. (ATI Systems) -- ATI Emergency Mass Notification Systems
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acoustic Technology, Inc. (ATI Systems) -- ATI Emergency Mass Notification Systems

item.title: CVE-2018-8864|2024-09-16T21:57:32.443Z -- acoustic%20technology%2C%20inc.%20%28ati%20systems%29 -- ati%20emergency%20mass%20notification%20systems
item.description: In ATI Systems Emergency Mass Notification Systems (HPSS16, HPSS32, MHPSS, and ALERT4000) devices, a missing encryption of sensitive data vulnerability caused by specially crafted malicious radio transmissions may allow an attacker to remotely trigger false alarms.
